SYSTEM: FAIR_Semantics.pdf: Página 23
FAIR semantics
Best practices for semantic artefacts
23
BP-Rec. 1: Use a unique naming convention for
concept/class and relations
§ Existing recommendation: OBO Foundry (principle
12), Industry Ontology Foundry (requirement 11)
§ Stakeholders: Practitioner and Community
BP-Rec. 2: Use an Ontology Naming Convention
§ Existing recommendation: OBO Foundry (principle 3), 
Industry Ontology Foundry
§ Stakeholders: Community
speaker: SYSTEM
